item.description:
2010 marks the 15th Anniversary of The Litchfield Jazz Festival. LJF continues the tradition of showcasing jazz legends and fostering up-and-coming talent as we've done since 1996. "Nothing beats the Litchfield Jazz Festival…an ongoing tradition for those in the know." -- JazzImprov.

This is a fantastic line up.


Saturday, August 7th Gabriel Alegria Afro-Per08-6-uvian Sextet Gerald Clayton Trio Dave Samuels Caribbean Jazz Project Mario Pavone Orange Double Tenor Sextet with support from Chamber Music American and The Doris Duke Charitable Foundation All-Star Cannonball Adderley Tribute featuring Wess Anderson, Terell Stafford, Benny Green, Matt Wilson, and Joanna Pascale Arturo O’Farrill Afro Latin Jazz Orchestra

The Festival Starts on Friday and runs through Sunday. Besides world renown artist there will be exotic crafts, Fantastic food, and of course wonderful music. Come bring a chair and we will picnic on the lawn so bring a appetizer to share. We can not bring wine but they will sell wine, and beer inside the festival. All though the festival starts at 12pm. I thought we could meet at 5pm, I will be there at 12pm but you folks can wonder in and out when ever you like. The last performance will be at 8:45 pm on Saturday evening. To purchase tickets go to http://www.litchfield...

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Litchfield Jazz Festival" You Don't Want To Miss
